facet_1.name: Magebane's Mirror
facet_1.effects: Burns a portion of the reflected ability's mana cost from its caster and deals damage depending of the burned mana.

facet_2.name: Mana Thirst
facet_2.effects: Grants self bonus attack damage when an enemy hero's mana falls below a certain threshold, with the bonuses increasing as their mana falls further. The lower the mana on the enemy unit, the clearer the target, granting the Mana-seeker vision and True Sight over an enemy hero at certain enemy health thresholds.

effects: The first successful hit after Anti-Mage Blinks additionally deals a bonus max mana as mana burn.
The first attack after Blink applies an on-hit undispellable debuff on the first attacked enemy unit that nullifies all mana restore and mana regeneration sources.
Upgrades the Counterspell-based reflected spell to its ability upgrade values.
Activates Counterspell on an allied hero that blocks any unit-targeted spells.
Creates a blinked fragment of Anti-Mage next to the enemy caster upon reflecting their unit-targeted spell while active.
Upgrades the Counterspell-based reflected spell to its ability upgrade values.

level_15: +7.5% Persecutor Min Slow / +15% Persecutor Max Slow

abilities.name: Persecutor
abilities.description: The anti-arcanist applies a movement speed slow based on the affected enemy unit's current mana missing.
abilities.details: Reduces the affected unit's movement speed by 12.5%/15%/17.5%/20% + 0.25%/0.3%/0.35%/0.4% per 1% current mana missing below 50% max mana.

ability_1.name: Mana Break
ability_1.details: Burns an enemy's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt.
ability_1.description: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.
technical_details: Stacks additively with other mana break sources
Mana Break is a bonus conditional attack damage source
The bonus attack damage values are directly added to Anti-Mage's attack damage in the combat log
interaction_notes: Does not interact with percentage-based bonus attack damage sources
Interacts with lifesteal, critical strike, and cleave sources

ability_2.name: Blink
ability_2.details: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
ability_2.description: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.
technical_details: When point-targeted beyond the min or max distance, Blink teleports Anti-Mage toward the min or max distance respectively

ability_3.name: Counterspell
ability_3.details: Counterspell may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that blocks any offensive unit-targeted spells.
ability_3.description: With the proper focus, Anti-Mage turns innate resistance into calculated retaliation.
technical_details: Interrupts Anti-Mage's channeling abilities upon cast
Stacks multiplicatively with other magic resistance sources
interaction_notes: Does not reflect Phantom Strike or Blink Strike

ability_4.name: Counterspell Ally
ability_4.details: Activates Counterspell on an allied hero that blocks any unit-targeted spells.
ability_4.description: The only magic that Anti-Mage will even barely tolerate... is friendship.
technical_details: Acquiring Aghanim's Shard unlocks this ability in the fifth ability slot
Creates a Counterspell-based illusion per unit-targeted ability blocked
interaction_notes: Considers clones and creep-heroes as heroes, illusions as creeps

ability_5.name: Mana Void
ability_5.details: Deals damage based on per point of missing mana of the targeted enemy unit within the radius. Stuns the primary target for a short duration.
ability_5.description: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.
technical_details: The targeting reticule must be unit-targeted on an enemy unit
Can be cast on enemy units without mana
Deals a 0-damage instance and applies the stun debuff on enemy units within the radius if the primary target does not have mana
interaction_notes: The magical spell damage applied within the radius is defined as: (TargetMaxMana - TargetCurrentMana) Ã— 0.8/0.95/1.1

changes: Increased Counterspell Magebane's Mirror reflected ability mana cost to mana burn factor from 1.5/1.9/2.3/2.7 to 1.5/2/2.5/3.
Aghanim's Shard upgrade: Counterspell Ally Magebane's Mirror now applies a 3 reflected ability mana cost to mana burn factor upon proc.
Talents: LVL 15 +5%/+15% Persecutor min/max movement speed slow increased to +7.5%/+15%.
LVL 20 +0.7s Mana Void stun duration increased to +0.8s.
Counterspell now has Spell Reflection by default.
Rescaled magic resistance bonus from 15%/25%/35%/45% to 16%/24%/32%/40%.
REWORKED Magebane's Mirror: Applies a ReflectedAbility MPCost * 1.5/1.9/2.3/2.7 mana burn per spell reflection proc.
Deals ManaBurn * 1, MAX = 400 spell damage per spell reflection proc.
Aghanim's Shard upgrade: Counterspell Ally now has Spell Reflection by default.
